module.name: pss_newssubscribers
module.description: <style type="text/css">a.descriptionLink {color:blue;text-decoration:underline;} a.descriptionLink:hover{color:red;text-decoration:none;}div.pssDescriptionDiv {background:#6a6a6a; color:white; padding:3px; margin-top:2px;}</style><div class="pssDescriptionDiv">Manage list of front-office newsletter block subscribers.<br /><b>Click on configure link to access to module content.</b></div>
module.author: PrestaScope
